description: a(n) = j if n is the j-th prime, else a(n) = k if n is the k-th composite.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
prog: (Haskell)a026238 n = a049084 n + a066246 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 29 2014(PARI) first(n)=my(c,p); vector(n-1,k, if(isprime(k+1),p++,c++)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 02 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
